projects.title: Rege.ai
projects.shortDescription: AI-powered resume builder tailored to job descriptions.
projects.longDescription: Rege.ai helps job seekers create ATS-optimized resumes using their personal highlights and AI models that tailor content based on job descriptions.

projects.title: LoopBoard
projects.shortDescription: Feedback and task prioritization tool for product teams.
projects.longDescription: LoopBoard helps teams collect feedback, organize tasks, and close the product feedback loop efficiently through a collaborative board.

projects.title: Onboardr
projects.shortDescription: Gamified onboarding platform for new hires.
projects.longDescription: Onboardr simplifies HR onboarding with a fun, structured experience including peer networking, content tracking, and automated scheduling.

projects.title: FoodieSpot
projects.longDescription: FoodieSpot enables users to book tables at their favorite restaurants via a voice-enabled assistant or web chatbot.

projects.title: TrackWise
projects.shortDescription: Smart personal budget tracker with reports and goals.
projects.longDescription: TrackWise helps users manage expenses, set savings goals, and view intuitive financial reports on a daily, monthly, and yearly basis.

projects.title: IdeaHub
projects.shortDescription: Community-driven platform to share and upvote project ideas.
projects.longDescription: IdeaHub enables makers and hackers to discover, post, and collaborate on project ideas. Great for hackathons and indie hackers.

projects.title: DailyMuse
projects.shortDescription: Daily creative writing prompts powered by AI.
projects.longDescription: DailyMuse delivers fresh, imaginative writing prompts and story starters every day, tailored to your favorite genres.

projects.title: CodeQuest
projects.shortDescription: Gamified coding platform with quests and challenges.
projects.longDescription: CodeQuest lets you complete fun, narrative-driven programming challenges and earn badges as you level up your skills.

projects.title: PulseAnalytics
projects.longDescription: PulseAnalytics provides live tracking of key business metrics with customizable dashboards and alerts.

projects.title: QuickLegal
projects.shortDescription: Generate basic legal documents with AI.
projects.longDescription: QuickLegal helps freelancers and startups draft simple contracts, NDAs, and service agreements using natural language input.
